CustomField.formula: CASE( Card_Type__c , "Visa", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156F00000GwOsI&oid=00D1m0000008aQN", "Visa",22,46), "American Express", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156F00000GwOsD&oid=00D1m0000008aQN", "American Express",22,46), "MasterCard", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0156F00000GwOsF&oid=00D1m0000008aQN", "MasterCard",22,46), "" )
CustomField.label: Card Image
